attributes.additional_details:
Anyone caught using a mobile phone (other than hands free) whilst driving should have their car crushed.
With the cost of Bluetooth hands free equipment at around £10 today there is NO EXCUSE.
Company car drivers should not be excluded as explaining to your boss about the loss of the company car would be a massive deterrent.
Everyone would be equal whether the car cost £500 or £50,000.
Massive deterrent, just what's needed to stamp out this selfish, dangerous habit.
